overview:
Kavin oversees the development and management of Lolapps games and properties. Kavin co-founded Lolapps in January 2008 and has helped to lead the company from zero to 40 million monthly unique visitors across various social networks. Prior to founding Lolapps, Kavin held product manager roles with Offermatica and SquareTrade.com. Kavin also worked as a software engineer at FactSet and ZeroG Software (acquired by MacroVision). Additionally, Kavin was one of three developers who built the backend and frontend of Skobee.com using Ruby on Rails, JavaScript and AJAX.

Kavin holds a B.S. in Electrical Engineering and Computer Science from University of California, Berkeley.
